author: pipermerriam
content: Does <@&688101493978562687> have anyone working on a verkle trie implementation?  Are you planning to leverage one of the existing implementations that is already underway?  I'm posing this as a potential apprenticeship program project for the <@&652918665943056397> client and I'm curious if erigon is interested in being included in this, but I think it only makes sense if nobody is already working on it and you don't have an established plan already in place.

author: mandrigin
content: I donâ€™t think we do, <@456226577798135808> can correct me, but I think we are interested in leveraging existing tools and codebase
